Info.title: How to Setup Cisco Secure Client and a VPN
Info.desc: How to Setup Cisco Secure Client and a VPN connection for UNCW.

Instructions.instruction: Sign up for a Cisco account using this [link](https://id.cisco.com/oauth2/default/v1/authorize?response_type=code&client_id=sdsprodoktaclient&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fsoftware.cisco.com%2Fdownload%2Fauthorization-code%2Fcallback&scope=openid%20profile%20offline_access&state=3DJfxJPz8MAs82IVUuPrRkaK).
Go to this [link](https://software.cisco.com/download/home/283000185) and sign in using the credentials you just created.
Under “Most Popular” click on the link that says something like "Secure Client 5 :5.1.2.42". Go back to this [link](https://software.cisco.com/download/home/283000185) if you clicked out of it.
Download the version that matches your operating system.
Follow the prompts from here, it should be pretty straight forward.
Here's a good UNCW link on how to setup a VPN. [Here](https://uncw.teamdynamix.com/TDClient/1875/Portal/KB/ArticleDet?ID=12377).
Here are the CSC 455 instructions on how to setup a VPN. Note that this is a &download link&(/download/Practice.docx).
